result.execSummary:
The defendant Seth L. Lofgren was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Resisting/Failing to Stop/Fleeing, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.04(2t).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Seth L. Lofgren

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
11:19  15TR561,571,572,573,574 are also included in the hearing. Defendant Seth L. Lofgren in court with attorney Lars Helmer Loberg.  William H. Thorie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Thorie files an amended information.  Plead to chage in amended information.  346.04(2t)   
$265.60 fine plus $200 DNA surcharge.   Traffic  15TR571 OWI def will plead guilty. 147 test.    15TR561  Refusal - dismiss.  Dismiss remaining traffic cases.    Constitutional rights explained to defendant  Exam'd re: understanding of law, penalty and rights  15CF104  Defendant pleads guilty  to the amended charge in information   Facts are correct  COURT ACCEPTS PLEA, FINDS DEF FREELY, INTELLIGENTLY, KNOWINGLY & UNDERSTANDINGLY MADE AND WAIVES CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS  The court finds the defendant guilty and adjudicates defendant guilty of charge in amended information.  Court orders $265.60 fine, DNA SC $200.00   Case # 15TR571   -   DEF PLEADS GUILTY    The court finds the defendant guilty and adjudicates defendant guilty  Forf $969.00 ,   7 mo rev,   creditt for adm susp. complete AODA and driver safety plan  15TR561, 15TR572, 15TR573, 15TR574 are all dismissed.     60 days to pay the fines.   Appeal rights are given to the defendant.

Information is filed with the court Defendant has a copy. Reading is waived.  DEF PLEADS NOT GUILTY to the charge in the information. Court receives the plea and reviews the conditions of the bond with the defendant. Set all cases for PTC

11:35  This  includes 15TR561, 15TR571, 15TR572, 15TR573, 15TR574 Defendant Seth L. Lofgren in court with attorney Lars Helmer Loberg.  William Thorie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Waiver of preliminary hearing is filed with the court and the Judge reviews it with the defendant. Court finds probable cause and binds the defendant over for further proceedings. Initial appearance on the TR cases and not guilty plea is entered on all cases.
Def waives his right to have a preliminary hearing in 20 days .
records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

3:30 Defendant Seth L. Lofgren in court  VIA VIDEO CONFERENCING FROM PCJ, in custody.  William H. Thorie appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Liesl Nelson appeared in court via phone with Def.   Defendant has copy of complaint. Court reads counts and maximum penalties. Court reads charging portion of the criminal complaint.   Constitutional rights explained to defendant.  Exam'd re: understanding of law, penalty and rights. Thorie: $5000 signature and conditions. Nelson: no objection. Def does not qualify for the services of the PD. Court goes over right for a preliminary hearing. Def has not been in the armed services.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 13, 2015 at 11:30 am.
